systemSettings.title: System settings

allowedAttachmentTypes.label: Allowed attachment types
allowedAttachmentTypes.help: Specify which MIME types are allowed for file uploads. Example: application/pdf, image/png, image/jpeg

auditRetention.label: Audit retention (days)
auditRetention.help: Number of days to retain audit logs. Set to 0 to retain indefinitely.

maxAttachmentSize.label: Max attachment size (MB)
maxAttachmentSize.help: Maximum allowed file size for attachments in megabytes. Set to 0 to disable limit.

reporting.label: Reporting
reporting.help: Enable or disable reporting features in the system.

systemSettings.description: Configure global system settings such as allowed attachments, audit retention and reporting.
